comprehensive_overview: Nextflow is a data-driven workflow management system that enables the writing of parallel and scalable computational pipelines using the Groovy domain-specific language. It simplifies the implementation and reproducibility of complex analysis workflows across different computing environments.
core_features: Support for various execution platforms including local, cluster, and cloud
Built-in support for containerization using Docker/Singularity
Traceability, dependency management, and automatic parallelization
Enhanced fault tolerance and resumption capabilities
